title: Client Keep Disconnecting and Kicking me out
body:
Some times (like 9 times out of 10) when i launch a game it keep me disconnetting from pvp net, when i'm in a game too it keeps saying reconnecting, even with ping around 50. After that i have to relaunch the game and i won't re-enter the game till it's finished.
I've already checked Ip-Helper on the service think but it didn't help at all.

Thank's for any advice :)

replies.body:
If that didn't help, then you might want to switch back. As stated, using a different DNS usually means you'll miss out on everything your ISP offers you, such as download meters, data usage reports, etc. Of course, use it again when testing out other settings to make sure **it's not a combination of things causing this problem.**

Check out [this page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) and try mostly everything it suggests there. If you need any help with that, or need help with actually doing it (because honestly some instructions are just bad), then just Reply to this message.
